snp4.9:6.1_0: “It seems that there is not easy to know or see
snp4.9:6.3_0: purity, and workers don’t last anyone.
snp4.9:6.4_0: She hasn’t seen the truth of the pride,
snp4.9:6.6_0: For I rejoice in the teaching,
snp4.9:7.4_0: But here is there anything that’s not shaken,
snp4.9:7.5_0: That’s why you’ve been beaten by the gods.

snp4.9:8.4_0: you’ll have no thought ‘I’m equal or special’.
